messages.content: What is the main function of the ComfyUI-ModelDownloader node?
The ComfyUI-ModelDownloader node is designed to download models (Checkpoints and LoRA) from external links and act as an output standalone node.
Which types of models can be downloaded using the ComfyUI-ModelDownloader node?
The ComfyUI-ModelDownloader node is capable of downloading both Checkpoints and LoRA models.
What is the operational status of the ComfyUI-ModelDownloader node after model download?
The ComfyUI-ModelDownloader node operates as a standalone node once the download process is complete.
